name: Screen Saver (Jared_I)
description:
Gameplay

Inspired by the classic “Breakout”, Screen Saver has the player destroying tapes invading the DVD screensaver universe. Play through multiple rounds until defeat and rack up a new high score!

Controls

Left Click to launch the DVD into the VHS tapes

Use the Mouse to move the Compact Disk to prevent failure

ESC. to pause

Feedback

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated :) I hope you enjoyed
